  • Vfricou.Apps
  • vfricou.apps.nginx role – Install and configure Nginx

vfricou.apps.nginx role – Install and configure Nginx

Note

This role is part of the vfricou.apps collection (version 1.0.0).

It is not included in ansible-core. To check whether it is installed, run ansible-galaxy collection list.

To install it use: ansible-galaxy collection install vfricou.apps.

To use it in a playbook, specify: vfricou.apps.nginx.

  • Entry point main – Install and configure Nginx

    • Synopsis

    • Parameters

    • Examples

    • Authors

Entry point main – Install and configure Nginx

Synopsis

  • Install Nginx

  • Manage Nginx general configuration

  • Manage Nginx vhosts configuration

  • Manage Nginx logrotate configuration

Parameters

Parameter

Comments

nginx_conf_dh_size

integer

Diffie Hellman size in bits

Default: 2048

nginx_conf_gzip_compression

boolean

Enable gzip directive in Nginx general configuration

Choices:

  • false ← (default)

  • true

nginx_conf_keepalive_timeout

integer

Configure keepalive_timeout directive in Nginx general configuration

Default: 65

nginx_conf_sendfile

boolean

Enable sendfile directive in Nginx general configuration

Choices:

  • false

  • true ← (default)

nginx_conf_tcp_nopush

boolean

Enable tcp_nopush directive in Nginx general configuration

Choices:

  • false ← (default)

  • true

nginx_log_path

string

Nginx logs location base path

Default: "/var/log/nginx"

nginx_logrotate_general_retention

integer

Logrotation for general nginx logs

Default: 90

nginx_logrotate_vhost_retention

integer

Logrotate for vhosts

Default: 90

nginx_vhosts

list / elements=dictionary / required

Nginx vhosts configurations

custom

string / required

Nginx vhost custom configurations

Use this to declare you location blocks

include

dictionary

Configuration inclusion declarations

letsencrypt

boolean

Enable ACME location block to allow ACME challenges verifications

Choices:

  • false

  • true

redirect_https

boolean

Enable HTTS redirection

Choices:

  • false

  • true

robots

boolean

Enable global robots.txt files (refuse all robots)

Choices:

  • false

  • true

logs

string

vhost logs path

Default: "C(<nginx_log_path>)/vhosts/C(vhost.name)"

name

string / required

vhost configuration filename

ports

list / elements=dictionary / required

Ports configuration

http2

boolean

Enable http2 directive for SSL vhosts

Choices:

  • false

  • true

opts

list / elements=string

HTTPS listen directive options

port

integer / required

Port to bind

type

string / required

Port type

Choices:

  • "http"

  • "https"

server_names

list / elements=string / required

Server names

ssl_opts

dictionary

vhost configuration options

cert_path

string / required

Path to vhost certificate fullchain

chain_path

string / required

Path to trusted CA chain

ciphers

list / elements=string

Ciphers to use on vhost

Default: ["ECDHE-ECDSA-AES256-GCM-SHA384", "ECDHE-ECDSA-CHACHA20-POLY1305", "ECDHE-ECDSA-CHACHA20-POLY1305-D", "ECDHE-RSA-AES256-GCM-SHA384", "ECDHE-RSA-CHACHA20-POLY1305", "ECDHE-RSA-CHACHA20-POLY1305-D", "ECDHE-ECDSA-AES128-GCM-SHA256", "ECDHE-RSA-AES128-GCM-SHA256", "!aNULL", "!eNULL", "!EXPORT", "!DES", "!MD5", "!PSK", "!RC4"]

ecdh_curve

list / elements=string

ECDH curves to use

Default: ["secp521r1", "secp384r1"]

enabled

boolean / required

Enable SSL configurations on vhost

Choices:

  • false

  • true

hsts

boolean

Enable HSTS headers

Choices:

  • false

  • true ← (default)

hsts_conf

string

HSTS configurations options

Default: "max-age=157680000;includeSubDomains"

key_path

string / required

Path to vhost private key

protocols

list / elements=string

Protocols to use with SSL enabled

Default: ["TLSv1.2", "TLSv1.3"]

session_buffer_size

string

Session buffer

Default: "1400"

session_cache_time

string

Session cache validity

Default: "10m"

session_cache_timeout

string

Session cache timeout

Default: "8h"

session_ticket

string

Activate session tickets

Choices:

  • "on"

  • "off" ← (default)

nginx_web_root

string

Nginx web root location

Used for ACME challenges

Default: "/srv/nginx"

nginx_worker_connnections

integer

Workers max connections

Default: 1024

Examples

# Playbook minio deployment
---
- name: 'Minio'
  hosts:
    - s3
  vars:
    minio_admin_username: '<vaulted_minio_admin_username>'
    minio_admin_password: '<vaulted_minio_admin_password>'
  roles:
    - role: vfricou.apps.minio
      vars:
        minio_admin_username: "{{ __vault_minio_datas.data.data.username }}"
        minio_admin_password: "{{ __vault_minio_datas.data.data.password }}"
